item.title: ‘Nobody 2’ Review: Bob Odenkirk Faces Off Against a Scenery-Chomping Sharon Stone in Entertaining Sequel
item.description: Timo Tjahjanto takes over directing duties for this follow-up to 2021’s surprise action hit about an ordinary family man who’s actually a professional assassin.

item.title: RZA On His New Film ‘One Spoon of Chocolate,’ And His Growth As a Filmmaker: “I Honestly Feel Like I Have Arrived”
item.description: The legendary rapper and music producer’s fourth film debuted at the Tribeca Film Festival this year.

item.title: Zohran Mamdani Links Up With Wu-Tang Clan in Viral Social Media Video
item.description: The New York mayoral candidate also meets The Lox and Run the Jewels.
